tag.name: @javabean.class
tag.doc: Used to specify class related information of JavaBean BeanInfo

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: Name of the JavaBean (typically the unqualified className)

attribute.name: class
attribute.doc: Class name of real bean

attribute.name: displayName
attribute.doc: The name displayed for the JavaBean

attribute.name: shortDescription
attribute.doc: A short description about the JavaBean

attribute.name: defaultProperty
attribute.doc: The default property of the JavaBean

attribute.name: expert
attribute.doc: Is the JavaBean used in expert mode ?

attribute.name: hidden
attribute.doc: Is the JavaBean hidden ?

attribute.name: preferred
attribute.doc: Is the JavaBean preferred ?

attribute.name: customizer
attribute.doc: Fully qualified class name of the JavaBean customizer

attribute.name: stopClass
attribute.doc: Fully qualified class name of the JavaBean ancestor used to stop introspection for additionnal informations

tag.name: @javabean.icons
tag.doc: Defines the icons used for the visual aspect of the JavaBean.

attribute.name: mono16
attribute.doc: Absolute or relative resource name for the monochrome icon of 16x16 pixels

attribute.name: color16
attribute.doc: Absolute or relative resource name for the color icon of 16x16 pixels

attribute.name: mono32
attribute.doc: Absolute or relative resource name for the monochrome icon of 32x32 pixels

attribute.name: color32
attribute.doc: Absolute or relative resource name for the color icon of 32x32 pixels

tag.name: @javabean.attribute
tag.doc: Defines the attributes of the JavaBean (propertyorder, etc).

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: Name of the attribute

attribute.name: value
attribute.doc: Value of the attribute

attribute.name: rtexpr
attribute.doc: Is the value a Java expression?

tag.name: @javabean.property
tag.doc: Defines the JavaBean property found by introspection

attribute.name: displayName
attribute.doc: The name displayed for the property

attribute.name: shortDescription
attribute.doc: A short description about the property

attribute.name: expert
attribute.doc: Is the property used in expert mode ?

attribute.name: hidden
attribute.doc: Is the property hidden ?

attribute.name: preferred
attribute.doc: Is the property preferred ?

attribute.name: bound
attribute.doc: Is the property bound ?

attribute.name: constrained
attribute.doc: Is the property constrained ?

attribute.name: propertyEditor
attribute.doc: Fully qualified class name of the PropertyEditor used to edit the property

attribute.name: readOnly
attribute.doc: Is the JavaBean property read-only ?

tag.name: @javabean.method
tag.doc: Defines the JavaBean method found by introspection

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: Name of the method

attribute.name: displayName
attribute.doc: The name displayed for the method

attribute.name: shortDescription
attribute.doc: A short description about the method

attribute.name: expert
attribute.doc: Is the method used in expert mode ?

attribute.name: hidden
attribute.doc: Is the method hidden ?

attribute.name: preferred
attribute.doc: Is the method preferred ?

tag.name: @javabean.param
tag.doc: Defines for each JavaBean method its parameters

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: Name of the parameter

attribute.name: displayName
attribute.doc: The name displayed for the parameter

attribute.name: shortDescription
attribute.doc: A short description about the parameter

attribute.name: propertyEditor
attribute.doc: Fully qualified class name of the PropertyEditor used to edit the parameter
